goals.active: Minister Arton has betrayed the Seraph.
goals.complete: Captain Thackeray and I told the queen what we learned. Minister Arton claims innocence, of course. We need more evidence to take him to trial, so I'm going to speak a former member of Tervelan's command who might know more.

goals.active: Sergeant Hal is stationed in Rurikton.
goals.complete: Sergeant Hal left Tervelan's command after the Screaming Falcons were ambushed. He directed me toward a Lionguard who was also a member of the company. She might know more.

goals.active: Visit Black Haven and speak with Dansky.
goals.complete: Corporal Dansky, now Deputy Dansky, told me that she carried messages for Tervelanâ€”including information on the Screaming Falcon's patrol route. Dansky believes that any surviving members of the Screaming Falcons might be at the bandit camp to the east.
